content.question: If <math alttext="f of x equals, the natural log of x, times the cosine of 4 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>, then <math alttext="f prime of x equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the negative of the fraction with numerator 4 times the sine of 4 x, and denominator x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of 4 x, and denominator x, end fraction, minus the natural log of x, times the sine of 4 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of 4 x, and denominator x, end fraction, minus 4 times the natural log of x, times the sine of 4 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of 4 x, and denominator x, end fraction, plus 4 times the natural log of x, times the sine of 4 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of 4 x, and denominator x, end fraction, minus 4 times the natural log of x, times the sine of 4 x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>ln</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>
